item.title: Convex 튜토리얼
item.description:
Convex 개요

Backend-as-a-Service로, JWT 방식으로 통신하여 사용할 수 있다. 서버리스/비동기처리가 기본인 서비스이기 때문에 Supabase등의 대안보다 관리가 용이하다.

graph LR
    subgraph webapp_a["web app: user a"]
        client_a["client library"]
    end
    
    subgraph webapp_b["web app: user b"]
        client_b["client library"]
    end
    
    subgraph convex["convex backend"]
        subgraph sync["sync engine"]
            mutation["mutation"]
            query["query"]
            db[("database")]
        end
    end
    
    client_a -->|"mutation request"| mutation
    client_b -->|"mutation request"| mutation
    mutation --> db
    db --> query
    query -->|"real-time updates"| client_a
    query -->|"real-time updates"| client_b

style webapp_a fill:#8b3a8b
style webapp_b fill:#8b3a8b
style convex fill:#f5a623
style sync fill:#f07d3e
style client_a fill:#f5a623
style client_b fill:#f5a623

graph TD
    A[시작] --> B{결정}
    B -->|Yes| C[프로세스 A]
    B -->|No| D[프로세스 B]
    C --> E[종료]
    D --> E
